title: Potence Wall Lamp  - Large
body:
Applying what he learned in his architectural training at the prestigious Milan Polytechnic, which during the 60s’ was at its peak of influence and fame, famous Italian designer Paolo Rizatto infused delicate and subtle details into tough and hard-wearing materials to create incredible pieces of industrial lamps. In addition, they are made space-saving and highly functional.  
The Paolo Rizatto 265 Wall Lamp became an inspiration to many lamp designers and was considered as a stunning classic-of-all-of-time. It showcased his amazing talents, skills, and dedication to the smallest details.
